name: Virtual Dream Center 3.2
description:
Virtual Dream Center is an online art center. 

"Virtual Dream Center 3.2" features the following virtual exhibitions :

BAPTISTE CACCIA & JEAN-BAPTISTE LENGLET : “ACID DREAM CENTER”
DIEGO GUGLIERI DON VITO & JULIEN HUMBERT : “VIEWS FROM MIAMI-FAUVE”
MIKAËL MONCHICOURT : “L’INTERIEUR DU LIQUIDE”
CAMILLE BERTRAND : “PARTIS VERS LE RIEN”

www.virtualdreamcenter.xyz
